featured.text: They sat down, rather nervously, and I explained that all I wanted was for them to count from one to twenty.
I turned on the tape-recorder and each in turn solemnly counted from one to twenty in their best accent.
Why did the author ask his friends to count from one to twenty? (A)
Dumas’s two most famous stories, The Three Musketeers and The Count of Monte Cristo, have inspired more than 100 films.
The police had to count on him to find out exactly how the accident happened.

definition.zh_def: 計算或數量的行為或過程。
definition.en_def: The act or process of determining the total number of something.
definition.example: Please count the number of apples in the basket.
